about_the_game:
This Strategy Guide will assist players in finding all the endings in the Mister Versatile: Versivion DLC.

Once you install/download the Versivion Strategy Guide in the DLC list of Mister Versatile in your Steam Library, you can find the files for it in your Local Files. Right-click the name of the game (Mister Versatile) from the list of games in your library, click Properties, go to the Local Files tab, then click Browse Local Files. You'll find the strategy guide in this folder.
detailed_description:

Once you install/download the Versivion Strategy Guide in the DLC list of Mister Versatile in your Steam Library, you can find the files for it in your Local Files. Right-click the name of the game (Mister Versatile) from the list of games in your library, click Properties, go to the Local Files tab, then click Browse Local Files. You'll find the strategy guide in this folder.
